Names #

Variables #

Bad âŒ

html
<script setup lang="ts">
  import { ref } from 'vue'

  const is_modal_open = ref(true)
</script>

Good âœ…

html
<script setup lang="ts">
  import { ref } from 'vue'

  const isModalOpen = ref(true)
</script>

Functions #

Bad âŒ

html
<script setup lang="ts">
  import { ref } from 'vue'

  const is_modal_open = ref(true)

  const handle_open_modal = function () {
    is_modal_open.value = !is_modal_open.value
  }
</script>

Good âœ…

html
<script setup lang="ts">
  import { ref } from 'vue'

  const isModalOpen = ref(true)

  const handleOpenModal = () => {
    isModalOpen.value = !isModalOpen.value
  }
</script>

Props #

Bad practies âŒ

html
<template>

  <!-- ğŸ’© -->
  <MyComponent myProp="props" />

  <!-- ğŸ’© -->
  <MyComponent my_prop="props" />

  <!-- ğŸ’© -->
  <MyComponent myprop="props" />

</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import MyComponent from './MyComponent.vue'
</script>

Good practies âœ…

html
<template>
  <MyComponent my-prop="props" />
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import MyComponent from './MyComponent.vue'
</script>
html
<template>
  <!-- ... -->
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { defineProps } from 'vue'

  defineProps({
    myProp: {
        // ...
    }
  })

</script>

Component names #

Firstly often you can find adviced to name you component like this style:

html
ğŸ“¦components
 â”£ ğŸ“‚global
 â”£ ğŸ“‚forms
 â”— ğŸ“‚todos
   â”— ğŸ“œCreate.vue
   â”— ğŸ“œUpdate.vue
   â”— ğŸ“œView.vue

But we named component by full name without attantion to the folder where it locale, becouse it help in future faster find and understand files. Please write names like this:

html
ğŸ“¦components
 â”£ ğŸ“‚global
 â”£ ğŸ“‚forms
 â”— ğŸ“‚todos
   â”— ğŸ“œCreateTodo.vue
   â”— ğŸ“œUpdateTodo.vue
   â”— ğŸ“œViewToto.vue

And some about style using components:

Bad practies âŒ

html
<template>

  <!-- ğŸ’© -->
  <createTodo />

  <!-- ğŸ’© -->
  <Createtodo />

  <!-- ğŸ’© -->
  <CreateTodo />

</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import CreateTodo from './CreateTodo.vue'
</script>

Good practies âœ…

html
<template>

  <!-- ğŸ’© -->
  <create-todo />

</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import CreateTodo from './CreateTodo.vue'
</script>
